author: The Associated Press
title: China's economy in worst downturn since '70s amid coronavirus battle
description: China faces a drawn-out struggle to revive its economy after it suffered its biggest contraction since at least the 1970s after ordering hundreds of millions of people to stay home to fight the coronavirus.
content:
China faces a drawn-out struggle to revive its economy after it suffered its biggest contraction since at least the 1970s after ordering hundreds of millions of people to stay home to fight the coronavirus.
The world's second-largest economy shrank by 6.8 pe… [+3788 chars]
